name: The Lion King
caption: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones
overview: It was the top-grossing animated film until Toy Story 3 passed it in 2010 and then Frozen topped them both.

name: 100 Toy Story
caption: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen
overview: Each CGI frame took from four to 13 hours to render, nearly as long as the last iPhone update.

name: Beauty and the Beast
caption: Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Richard White
overview: It was the first animated film ever nominated for best picture.

name: Avatar
caption: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver
overview: It's the highest grosser of all time, which explains the three sequels that will start rolling out in December 2016.
